title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for June 2025
description: The bonus round solutions for June 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for June 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here are the answers to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles today throughout June 2025. We'll also include the Fan Friday word during the week.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Up ahead is the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of June 2025. We’ll reveal the bonus round solution first before sharing the answers for the standard puzzles and the toss-ups. For clarity, these solutions are for the weekday show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White. That is, the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune answers can be found in other guides. Tonight’s episode will have three new contestants: Teresa Vaughn, Angie Sutton, and Barry Wolfsheimer. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for June 12. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Friday, June 13, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – DOLPHINS [Living Things] Tossup #1 – EXCLUSIVE PARTIES [Event] Tossup #2 – BIG-TICKET ITEMS [Things] Regular Puzzle #1 – THRILLING TRIPS & TERRIFIC TOURS [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – MINGLING WITH CELEBRITIES [Showbiz] Regular Puzzle #3 – ELEPHANTS AND RHINOS [Living Things] Tossup #3 – WIDE-OPEN SPACE [Place] Tossup #4 – OUTER SPACE [Place] Tossup #5 – PARKING SPACE [Place] Regular Puzzle #4 – COLLECTING VINTAGE CARS [Fun & Games] Fan Friday – ROYAL Here are the puzzle answers for Thursday, June 12: Bonus Round Puzzle – HIGH-END FASHION [What Are You Wearing?] HANDCRAFTED SOAP [Around the House] Here are the puzzle answers for Wednesday, June 11: Bonus Round Puzzle – POACHED SALMON [Food & Drink] Tossup #1 – PASSPORT IN HAND [Phrase] Tossup #2 – FINE Every successful entry into the Fan Friday Giveaway will give a chance for fans to earn extra cash in $50K for our 50 giveaway. For those interested in attending a show of Wheel of Fortune, it will be live in Las Vegas on July 11, 12, 18, and 19, with tickets available at Paris Las Vegas Hotel & Casino.

Up ahead is the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of June 2025. We’ll reveal the bonus round solution first before sharing the answers for the standard puzzles and the toss-ups. For clarity, these solutions are for the weekday show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White. That is, the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune answers can be found in other guides. Tonight’s episode will have three new contestants: Teresa Vaughn, Angie Sutton, and Barry Wolfsheimer. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for June 12.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Friday, June 13, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – DOLPHINS [Living Things]
  • Tossup #1 – EXCLUSIVE PARTIES [Event]
  • Tossup #2 – BIG-TICKET ITEMS [Things]

  • Tossup #4 – OUTER SPACE [Place]

As usual, the Fan Fridays sweepstakes by Collette is still live and we’ll share the Fan Friday word as part of the solutions above. Every successful entry into the Fan Friday Giveaway will give a chance for fans to earn extra cash in $50K for our 50 giveaway.

For those interested in attending a show of Wheel of Fortune, it will be live in Las Vegas on July 11, 12, 18, and 19, with tickets available at Paris Las Vegas Hotel & Casino.
